publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2060 Margaret Mitchell: Destruction of Burns Monument, Kilmarnock—That the Parliament condemns first, the inadequate maintenance and unacceptable neglect of the historic Burns Monument in Kay Park, Kilmarnock, and now, its destruction by fire and calls on the Scottish Executive to ensure that East Ayrshire Council consults widely before taking a decision on how best to secure the preservation and restoration of the monument.

S2M-2060 Destruction of Burns Monument, Kilmarnock (lodged on 23 November 2004) Robin Harper*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Murdo Fraser*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, John Scott*, Mr David Davidson*, Alex Neil*
S2M-2060 Destruction of Burns Monument, Kilmarnock (lodged on 23 November 2004) Alex Johnstone*, Mary Scanlon*, Alex Fergusson*, Dr Jean Turner*, Phil Gallie*

S2M-2060 Margaret Mitchell: Destruction of Burns Monument, Kilmarnock—That the Parliament condemns first, the inadequate maintenance and unacceptable neglect of the historic Burns Monument in Kay Park, Kilmarnock, and now, its destruction by fire and calls on the Scottish Executive to ensure that East Ayrshire Council consults widely before taking a decision on how best to secure the preservation and restoration of the monument. Supported by: Robin Harper, Rob Gibson, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Murdo Fraser, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, John Scott, Mr David Davidson, Alex Neil, Alex Johnstone, Mary Scanlon, Alex Fergusson, Dr Jean Turner, Phil Gallie, Bill Aitken*
S2M-2060 Destruction of Burns Monument, Kilmarnock (lodged on 23 November 2004) Chris Ballance*
S2M-2060 Destruction of Burns Monument, Kilmarnock (lodged on 23 November 2004) Rosie Kane*
S2M-2060 Destruction of Burns Monument, Kilmarnock (lodged on 23 November 2004) Mr Brian Monteith*
